Title: Snow White (2025) - Movie Review
Description:
Disney's newest attempt to make a live action adaptation of a beloved animated classic.....Here's my review for DISNEY'S SNOW WHITE!

#SnowWhite

Comments.author: @quintonchristie7149
Comments.text: Sweeties, simple math; $269m initial budget, $100m marketing, $75m re-shoots (conservatively) = $444m total costs (conservatively), so them making $100m leaves them with what loss...? $344m (conservatively)

replies.text: They made more than 200 million worldwide, "sweatie".

Comments.author: @cac1504
Comments.text: TheÂ Walt Disney Company's live action remake of "Snow White" hit theaters just over a month ago on March 19. And now, by late April, its box office run has all but officially come to an end, cementing its status as one of the biggest box office flops in Hollywood history.
